import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaShieldAlt, FaBullseye, FaEye } from "react-icons/fa"; import "../styles/About.css"; import shaileshJadhav from "../assets/shailesh.jpg"; // Placeholder for CEO photo import bhuvaneshManwatkar from "../assets/bhuvanesh.jpg"; // Placeholder for Pune Branch Head photo function About() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Protecting Lives with PBJ Fire

Committed to Safety, Driven by Innovation.
{/* Who We Are, Mission, Vision */} Who We Are Since 2019, PBJ Fire has been a trusted leader in fire safety from Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar. We deliver ISI & CE certified fire-fighting equipment, expert consulting, and turnkey installations, ensuring unmatched safety through innovation and reliability. Our Mission We provide holistic fire safety and surveillance solutions, including fire detection and suppression systems, and advanced CCTV monitoring, to empower organizations. Using cutting-edge technology, with features such as remote monitoring and real time alerts, and precision installation and maintenance, we create a secure future for all our clients. Our Vision We aim to be India’s most reliable fire safety partner, a name synonymous with unwavering dependability and cutting-edge solutions. Through a relentless dedication to pioneering safety innovation, fostering deep-rooted trust with our clients, and consistently delivering measurable excellence, we are committed to setting new benchmarks across all industries, ensuring a safer future for India. {/* Key People */}

Our Leadership

Shailesh Jadhav CEO & Founder A trailblazing leader with an unwavering dedication to fire safety, Shailesh Jadhav founded PBJ Fire to transform the industry. Under his guidance, PBJ Fire has become a reliable name in government, commercial, and industrial sectors. His mantra: “Fire safety is a duty to safeguard lives and assets.”
Bhuvanesh Manwatkar Pune Branch Head Spearheading PBJ Fire’s expansion into Pune, Bhuvanesh ensures flawless service delivery. His technical mastery and strategic vision have solidified PBJ Fire’s reputation. Passionate about innovation and efficiency, he champions global safety standards to address India’s evolving fire safety demands. {/* Growth Story */}

Our Growth Journey

From our roots in Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar to expanding into Pune and beyond, PBJ Fire has delivered landmark fire safety projects for top industries and institutions. We’ve partnered with MGM University, Prozone Mall, PVR, INOX, and DRDO, showcasing our expertise in high-stakes environments. As we grow, our commitment to quality, trust, and life-saving innovation remains unwavering.

); } export default About;
